item.title: Beocord 5000 Type 4923: New power supply capacitors and belts
item.description:
In the last update on this Beocord 5000 (Type 4923), I was about to install new belts and replace the power supply’s electrolytic capacitors. This post covers the completion of those tasks. The original power supply capacitors are shown below. …and the replacement capacitors are here. Next up are the belts. First is the tape counter belt. Now for the clutch wheel and flywheel belts. Replacing these requires disassembling some brackets...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-type-4923-new-power-supply-capacitors-and-belts/
